body:
Comment 1 by **mrbk@gnarf.org**: 
I second this feature with a minor addition.
The return value of the goroutine could be sent down the channel.
It would allow you to write something like this:

func main() {
    c = go theanswer();
    fmt.Printf("%d\n", <-c);
}

func theanswer() (int)
{
    return 42;
}
